Title: Enacts the "Finger Lakes watershed stewardship act"
Summary: Enacts the "Finger Lakes watershed stewardship act"; designates the department of health as the lead agency in governing watersheds of the eleven Finger Lakes that serve as a source of drinking water for surrounding communities; authorizes other state agencies to promulgate rules and regulations governing watersheds of the Finger Lakes that are not inconsistent with department of health rules and regulations.
LawCode: Amd ยง1100, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to designating the department of health as the lead agency in governing watersheds of the eleven Finger Lakes that serve as a source of drinking water for surrounding communities
